name: tester-go
description: A tester package for the Go language that uses `go test` to display test coverage.
author: Joe Fitzgerald <jfitzgerald@pivotal.io> (http://github.com/joefitzgerald)

runCoverageOnSave.title: Run Coverage Tool On Save
runCoverageOnSave.description: Run `go test -coverprofile` each time a file is saved

runCoverageWithShortFlag.title: Run Coverage With Short Flag Set

coverageHighlightMode.title: Coverage Highlight Mode
coverageHighlightMode.description: Control the way that coverage highlighting occurs

displayTestOutputPanel.title: Display Test Output Panel
displayTestOutputPanel.description: When the test output panel is not being displayed, it will toggle on using this setting

maxPanelHeight.title: Maximum Panel Height
maxPanelHeight.description: Prevent the panel from occupying the entire window
